subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Jerome Pineau, a Frenchman riding for the Quickstep team, took advantage of a three-man breakaway to win the fifth stage of the Giro d’Italia.
snippet: Jerome Pineau, a Frenchman riding for the Quickstep team, took advantage of a three-man breakaway to win the fifth stage of the Giro d’Italia.
